logo_desc: Professional expertise in facility management, operation and maintenance
hero_slide1_desc: We execute private contracting projects with high precision and outstanding quality, from design to final delivery, adhering to the highest safety and quality standards.
hero_slide1_card_desc: Execution of private contracting projects with the highest quality standards and professional efficiency, ensuring on-time delivery.
hero_slide2_subtitle: Building Strong Foundations for the Future
hero_slide2_desc: We execute integrated infrastructure projects including roads, bridges, tunnels, and sewage networks using the latest technologies and approved materials.
hero_slide2_card_desc: Execution of integrated infrastructure projects with global standards that contribute to building modern and sustainable communities.
hero_slide3_desc: We provide comprehensive electrical extension solutions for residential, commercial, and industrial buildings, ensuring full compliance with electrical safety standards.
hero_slide3_card_desc: Execution of safe and reliable electrical installations using the latest technologies and international standards to ensure network efficiency and safety.
hero_slide4_desc: We execute HVAC works, mechanical system installations, and industrial equipment maintenance with the highest quality standards.
hero_slide4_card_desc: Design, execution, and maintenance of integrated mechanical systems using the latest technologies to ensure efficiency and reliability.
hero_slide5_desc: We provide comprehensive operation and maintenance services for buildings and facilities, with preventive and proactive maintenance plans to ensure continuity and system efficiency.
hero_slide5_card_desc: Integrated operation and maintenance services to ensure long-term sustainability and operational efficiency of facilities.
about_desc: A team of experts and specialists in maintenance, cleaning, and government project operations
about_experience_desc: Dreen Facilities Management has extensive experience in maintenance, cleaning, and operating government projects across many public and private sectors
about_team_desc: We employ more than (623) skilled workers and technicians specialized in:
project_1_title: Maintenance Services Project at Overseas Military Hospital
project_2_title: Sports City Operation & Cleaning – Wadi Al-Dawasir
project_2_desc: Operation and maintenance of sports facilities
project_4_desc: Operation and maintenance of government facilities
about_partners_sup_title: We collaborate with the best in the world
about_partners_p: We are proud of our partnership with a select group of leading brands that ensure our customers receive the highest standards of quality and durability in every product we offer.
about_hero_desc: Dreen Contracting is a leading company in facility management, operation, and maintenance. We provide integrated solutions for construction and maintenance projects, ensuring the highest levels of quality, efficiency, and commitment to deadlines.
director_subtitle: A future vision and ambitious outlook for Dreen Contracting
director_opening: What started as a dream has become a tangible reality through dedication and hard work, achieving successive successes in Dreen Contracting.
director_p1: We spared no effort to maintain our leading position. In light of the economic growth and major urban development that the Kingdom is experiencing, and the distinguished geographical location, the Kingdom kept pace with modern and advanced economic movements that helped attract investors and increase economic activity in the country.
director_p2: Therefore, we have been keen on continuous development to raise the efficiency of Darin Contracting, with policies and strategic plans through which we aspire to contribute effectively to enriching our fields and gaining the trust of our clients, by establishing the principles of credibility, professionalism and commitment.
director_p3: Since we started practicing our business at Darin Contracting, our reputation has grown among our clients as one of the leading companies in the Kingdom in terms of quality of performance at all levels, which we see in the satisfaction of our clients, which is the basis of our success and the source of our pride.
director_p4: Behind all of this stands a team working with one spirit, each member of which has a strong sense of responsibility and does everything possible to deliver the best that can be obtained.
principle_1_desc: Transparency and honesty in all our dealings
principle_2_desc: Expertise and specialization in project execution
principle_3_desc: Commitment to agreed timelines and quality
services_hero_desc: Dreen Contracting provides a comprehensive range of engineering and contracting services to meet all your project needs. Our specialized team ensures quality and efficiency at every stage of execution.
services_desc: At Dreen Contracting, we have extensive experience gained from executing many large-scale projects across various fields
services_special_desc: We have executed many specialized operation and maintenance projects, gaining strong experience in meeting post-handover building needs and ensuring continuous efficiency.
service_baner_title: Specialized expertise in operation and maintenance
service_baner_sup: We have carried out many specialized works in the field of operation and maintenance, which has given us great experience in meeting the needs of buildings after their handover and ensuring the continuity of their efficiency.
service1_desc: Operation and maintenance of government buildings according to the latest technical and engineering standards, ensuring high efficiency and safety compliance
service2_desc: Comprehensive services for operating and maintaining commercial buildings to ensure business continuity and enhance user and customer experience.
service3_desc: We provide facility management and operation services to the highest quality standards, from planning and feasibility studies, through daily operation and preventive maintenance, to emergency management, ensuring efficient and safe business continuity.
service4_desc: Operation and maintenance of educational facilities to provide a safe and suitable environment for the learning process across all its facilities.
service5_desc: Operation and maintenance of educational facilities to provide a safe and suitable environment for the learning process across all its facilities.
service6_desc: Design and implementation of all types of electrical systems, ensuring safety, high operational efficiency, and compliance with standard specifications.
services_cta_title: Do You Have a Project or Need Consultation?
services_cta_desc: Our expert team is ready to help you find the right solutions for your project
vision_subtitle: We shape the future with confident steps toward achieving our ambitious goals
vision_quote: Success is not a coincidence, it is the result of strategic planning, hard work, and commitment to excellence.
vision_intro: We strive to be a distinguished company across the Kingdom with diversified investments and strong leadership capabilities.
vision_point_1_desc: We aim to enter major strategic investments and lead the contracting, operation, and maintenance sector.
vision_point_2_desc: We aim to be leaders in delivering integrated maintenance services with the highest quality standards.
vision_point_3_desc: To be the first choice in our field by gaining the trust of government and individuals.
vision_2030_desc: We aim to actively contribute to Saudi Arabia’s economic transformation under Vision 2030.
vision_value_1_desc: We focus on areas where we have a strong competitive advantage.
vision_value_2_desc: We believe in strategic partnerships to strengthen market impact.
vision_value_3_desc: We continuously improve our performance to keep pace with industry developments.
contact_description: We are here to serve you! Contact us directly via phone, WhatsApp, or our social media platforms. Our dedicated team is ready to answer your inquiries and support your projects.
contact_page_subtitle: We are here to answer your inquiries. Reach us through any method that suits you.
landline_desc: Company landline, available during working hours
mobile_desc: Available on WhatsApp for urgent inquiries
urgent_contact_desc: For urgent inquiries regarding construction projects and on-site execution

branch_jeddah_address: Al Sahafa District, King Fahd Road
branch_dammam_address: Al Nakheel District, King Abdullah Road
service_request_desc: Request your service now and get comprehensive contracting solutions with high quality and precise timelines. Our team of specialists is ready to execute your project efficiently and professionally.
service_ops_desc: Professional facility operation and maintenance services.
service_elec_desc: Complete electrical installations to international standards.
service_build_desc: Executing construction projects with modern techniques.

success_desc: Thank you for contacting Dreen Contracting. We will get back to you shortly.

footer_company_desc: A leader in facility management, operation, and maintenance, delivering high-quality services with professionalism and contributing to Saudi Vision 2030.
footer_newsletter_desc: Subscribe to receive our latest news and special offers
